Text: I'd be quite happy to download sceneline torrents, but for me, 99% of them never connect.  The trackers have a message saying "No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it".  Any ideas please?
sounds like your torrent client doesnt support udp trackers or dht.
Thanks for the tip.  Using utorrent, I enabled DHT via Properties and sometime later the torrents are seeding.  I hope things stay like this, the 720p torrents on TPB are very good, cheers for them.
